metadata.dc:author: Sanjuán Juaristi, J
metadata.dc:description: This report summarizes our experience in obtaining microphonic potentials in human beings. Special studies were made to obtain microphonic potentials in premature newborns.
metadata.dc:title: Estudio de la audición en prematuros. Microfónicos cocleares evocados.
[Hearing in premature infants. Evoked-cochlear microphones].
